name: MODERN WARSHIPS
summary:
The mightiest modern fighting ships are waiting for you! Fight with your friends in the online action game Modern Warships.

In Modern Warships, you'll become the captain of a modern battleship. All game models are made strictly according to the drawings and look like real ships. The game has a wide range of weapons, including cannons and rockets. And you'll be able to pilot deck helicopters and fighter jets. Also, submarines will be available too.

Key features:

– More than 30 warships, made according to the drawings and real characteristics.
– Ships, submarines, planes, and helicopters in one battle.
– Different classes of ships can carry different weapons: missiles, guns, grenade launchers, torpedo tubes, planes, and helicopters.
– Each ship is a real combat vehicle, which can be fully customized by changing weapons in slots.
– Weekly tournaments with in-game prizes.
– Top-notch graphics on mobile platforms.
